resources.string: Grasp real world skills to benefit your economic needs
High quality lectures and unlimited questions

To start of your journey start with the basic literacy course where you will learn the basics of using smart phones and basic English grammer.
English has become a global language that connects people from different cultures and backgrounds, and as such, it is essential to learn English to communicate with people from all over the world.
Most technological devices use English as a default language which makes learning English a must in order to use a technological project.
In most technological devices we use the word Settings to denote that inside here users can fix their account settings such as password, payment option, profile photo and many more.
In this section you will learn basic English terms widely used in technological devices, what a phone is, and how to use one.

Touch the first course to start your course, by touching the title you will start your course. The Circle you see next to the title is a progress bar which gives u progress on your course. After every title there will be a test.
This is the place you will learn at. Learning can be done in various ways. The course maybe given in a text or in a video.
After finishing learning press this button to go the next phase of your learning process. Happy learning.
